mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO SP_LOGS_PRODUCT_HIS (PD_ID, PD_TIME, LGCS_CODE, LGCS_NAME, PD_CODE, SCIENTIFIC_NAME, LOCAL_NAME, SALES_NAME, PD_NAME, CLASSES_CODE, CLASSES, MACHINING_CODE, MACHINING, BREED_CODE, BREED, FEATURE_CODE, FEATURE, WEIGHT_CODE, WEIGHT, GRADE_CODE, GRADE, DEL_FLG, CRT_ID, CRT_TIME, UPD_ID, UPD_TIME, ACT_ID, ACT_TIME, VER ) VALUES
(#{item.pdId}, #{item.pdTime}, #{item.lgcsCode}, #{item.lgcsName}, #{item.pdCode}, #{item.scientificName}, #{item.localName}, #{item.salesName}, #{item.pdName}, #{item.classesCode}, #{item.classes}, #{item.machiningCode}, #{item.machining}, #{item.breedCode}, #{item.breed}, #{item.featureCode}, #{item.feature}, #{item.weightCode}, #{item.weight}, #{item.gradeCode}, #{item.grade}, 0, #{item.crtId}, #{item.crtTime}, #{item.updId}, #{item.updTime}, #{item.actId}, #{item.actTime}, 1 )
